name: Gum-Gum Cuatro Jet Cross Shock Bazooka
effect: [Counter] If your Leader has the {ODYSSEY} type and you have 2 or more rested Characters, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
